content: The Wickedness of Jerusalem
To the oppressing city!
She has not obeyed  voice,
She has not received correction;
She has not trusted in the ,
She has not drawn near to her God.
A Faithful Remnant(H)
“Therefore wait for Me,” says the ,
“Until the day I rise up for plunder;
My determination  to gather the nations
To My assembly of kingdoms,
To pour on them My indignation,
All My fierce anger;
All the earth shall be devoured
With the fire of My jealousy.
Joy in God’s Faithfulness
Sing, O daughter of Zion!
Shout, O Israel!
Be glad and rejoice with all  heart,
O daughter of Jerusalem!
The  has taken away your judgments,
He has cast out your enemy.
The King of Israel, the ,  in your midst;
You shall see disaster no more.
